metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5432 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A specifically malformed MQTT Subscribe packet crashes MQTT Brokers using the mqtt-packet module versions < 3.5.1, 4.0.0 - 4.1.3, 5.0.0 - 5.6.1, 6.0.0 - 6.1.2 for decoding.

criterions.comment: node-mqtt-packet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
